attributes.action: carers save massive amounts of money for the country carers should get a fairer deal
attributes.additional_details: People who care for a family member work 24 hours a day 7 days a week and get a small amount of money to do this. They save the country billions each year.  They struggle to make ends meet and should be given some of the savings the country make back. More money for carers please and dont take it off of the income support.
